name: Zesty Pesto Pasta with Rainbow Chard, Zucchini, Red bell pepper
description: Zesty Pesto Pasta with Rainbow Chard, Zucchini, Red bell pepper. Fusilli with walnut basil lemony pesto, greens and veggies. Easy Weeknight Pasta. Vegan Recipe. can be gluten-free with gluten-free pasta
recipeIngredient: 3 to 4  large chard leaves (hard stems removed and chopped)
salt (about 1/3 tsp and black pepper to taste)
zest of 1/2 a lime or 1/4 lemon (add more to preference)

itemListElement.text: Process all the ingredients in a food processor until coarsely blended. You can use all basil or 1/4 cup cilantro + 3/4 cup basil.
itemListElement.name: Process all the ingredients in a food processor until coarsely blended. You can use all basil or 1/4 cup cilantro + 3/4 cup basil.

itemListElement.text: Cook the pasta according to instructions on the package.
itemListElement.name: Cook the pasta according to instructions on the package.

itemListElement.text: Meanwhile heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add oil when hot and tilt the pan to coat. Add garlic, bell pepper and a pinch of salt. Cook for 2 minutes or until garlic is translucent.
itemListElement.name: Meanwhile heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add oil when hot and tilt the pan to coat. Add garlic, bell pepper and a pinch of salt. Cook for 2 minutes or until garlic is translucent.

itemListElement.text: Add chopped chard, zucchini and pepper flakes. Mix. Cover and cook until the chard is wilted. Add a splash of water if needed.
itemListElement.name: Add chopped chard, zucchini and pepper flakes. Mix. Cover and cook until the chard is wilted. Add a splash of water if needed.

itemListElement.text: Add the prepared pesto and mix in.
itemListElement.name: Add the prepared pesto and mix in.

itemListElement.text: Add the cooked pasta and toss. Add salt and pepper to taste and mix in. Taste and adjust.
itemListElement.name: Add the cooked pasta and toss. Add salt and pepper to taste and mix in. Taste and adjust.

itemListElement.text: Cover and cook for 2 minutes. Add in the zest and mix in. Taste and add more zest if needed. Garnish with <a href="" target=_blank">pepita parmesan or other nut based parm and serve.
